gremlins

Class Immobile

  • java.lang.Object
    • gremlins.Entity
      • gremlins.Immobile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Destructable, ExitPortal, FreezePotion, Indestructable

    public abstract class Immobile
extends Entity
    Abstract Immobile class of objects. All imovable objects on screen that do not actively move or change locations are extended from this class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected processing.core.PImage texture
      the Imobile entity's sprite
      protected boolean viable
      whether the imobile entity can engage in collisions

        public Immobile(int x,

        Constructor for an immobile object

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(App app)
        Abstract Draw method updates what the immobile object should look like on the screen
        Parameters:
        app - the PApplet, which it inherits methods from

      • update

        public abstract int update()
        Abstract Update method, performs various update tasks on blocks depending on their type and interactions with Mobile entities.
        Returns:
        integer 1 or 0. Only destructable blocks (bricks) return 1 for fireball interactions

      • destroy

        public abstract void destroy()
        Abstract destroy method, different uses for differeing block types.

      • getViable

        public abstract boolean getViable()
        Abstract getViable method returns the interactivity of the immobile object
        Returns:
        true or false, depending on whether the wizard, gremlins, projectiles can interact with it

      • setViable

        public abstract void setViable(boolean b)
        Abstract set viable method sets whether the block is interactable anymore
        Parameters:
        b - true or false.
